exports.name: localStorageStore
exports.type: <T>(key: string, initial: T, options?: StateOptions<T>) => Writable<T>

comment.raw:
/**
 * An observable store that uses localStorage to store data asyncronously. It supports Maps and Sets, debouncing and deferring localStorage updates, and syncronizes with localStorage events across tabs.
 *
 * @param key - The key to store the data under.
 *
 * @param initial - The initial value of the store.
 *
 * @param options - {@link StateOptions}
 *
 * @example
 * ```ts
 * const store = localStorageStore('foo', 5)
 * ```
 *
 */
comment.summary: An observable store that uses localStorage to store data asyncronously. It supports Maps and Sets, debouncing and deferring localStorage updates, and syncronizes with localStorage events across tabs.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to store the data under.

params.name: initial
params.description: The initial value of the store.

blocks.content: const store = localStorageStore('foo', 5)
